mapper.select: select j.jno, j.jdate, j.jtime, m.mno as driver_no, m.mname as driver_name, r.rno as route_no, r.spot_order as route_order, r.spot_name as route_name from talat_journey j inner join talat_memb m on j.mno=m.mno inner join talat_journey_route r on j.jno=r.jno where r.spot_order = 1 or r.spot_order = 100 order by j.jno asc

select j.jno, j.jdate, j.jtime, m.mno as driver_no, m.mname as driver_name, r1.rno as route1_no, r1.spot_order as route1_order, r1.spot_name as route1_name, r2.rno as route2_no, r2.spot_order as route2_order, r2.spot_name as route2_name from talat_journey j inner join talat_memb m on j.mno=m.mno inner join talat_journey_route r1 on j.jno=r1.jno inner join talat_journey_route r2 on j.jno=r2.jno where r1.spot_order = 1 and r2.spot_order = 100 order by j.jno asc

select j.jno, j.jdate, j.jtime, m.mno as driver_no, m.mname as driver_name from talat_journey j inner join talat_memb m on j.mno=m.mno
where j.dept like concat('%', #{value},'%') and j.arr like concat('%', #{value},'%') and j.jdate like concat('%', #{value},'%') and j.jtime like concat('%', #{value},'%')
order by j.jno desc

select j.jno, j.jdate, j.jtime, j.seat_psgr_cap, j.seat_rear_cap, j.pet, j.jfee, j.jcont, m.mno as driver_no, m.mname as driver_name, r1.rno as route1_no, r1.spot_order as route1_order, r1.spot_name as route1_name, r1.lat as route1_lat, r1.lng as route1_lng, r2.rno as route2_no, r2.spot_order as route2_order, r2.spot_name as route2_name, r2.lat as route2_lat, r2.lng as route2_lng from talat_journey j inner join talat_memb m on j.mno=m.mno inner join talat_journey_route r1 on j.jno=r1.jno inner join talat_journey_route r2 on j.jno=r2.jno where r1.spot_order = 1 and r2.spot_order = 100 and j.jno = #{value}

select r.rno as route_no, r.jno as route_jno, r.spot_order as route_order, r.spot_name as route_name, r.lat as route_lat, r.lng as route_lng from talat_journey j inner join talat_journey_route r on j.jno=r.jno where j.jno=#{value}
mapper.update: update talat_journey set jdate = #{journeyDate}, jtime = #{journeyTime}, seat_psgr_cap = #{seatPassenger}, seat_rear_cap = #{seatRear}, pet = #{pet}, jfee = #{fee}, jcont = #{content} where jno = #{jno}
